mapper.insert: insert into customer( store_id, first_name, last_name, email, address_id ) values ( #{storeId}, #{firstName}, #{lastName}, #{email}, #{addressId} )
mapper.select:
select count(*) from customer
concat(first_name, last_name) like concat('%',#{searchName},'%')
select customer_id customerId, first_name firstName, last_name lastName, email from customer where active = 1 and concat(first_name, last_name) like concat('%',#{searchName},'%')

select r.rental_id rentalId, f.film_id filmId, i.inventory_id inventoryId, f.title title, p.amount amount, r.rental_date rentalDate from rental r inner join inventory i on r.inventory_id = i.inventory_id inner join film f on i.film_id = f.film_id inner join payment p on r.rental_id = p.rental_id where r.customer_id = #{customerId} order by rentalDate desc

select cu.customer_id customerId, cu.store_id storeId, cu.first_name firstName, cu.last_name lastName, cu.address_id addressId, cu.email email, a.address address, a.district district, a.postal_code postalCode, a.phone phone, a.city_id cityId, ci.city city, ci.country_id countryId, co.country country, cu.create_date createDate from customer cu left join address a on cu.address_id = a.address_id inner join city ci on a.city_id = ci.city_id inner join country co on ci.country_id = co.country_id where cu.customer_id = #{customerId}
